metadata.title: Costa Rica to Vancouver, 1981
metadata.description: CTD, nutrient, ultra-trace metal, carbonate chemistry data from a cruise from Costa Rica to Vancouver, B.C. in 1981 aboard the Hudson.
keywords: South Inner Coast (Johnstone, Georgia, JDF, inlets and passages)
metadata.notes:

Supplemental Information: Custom software is available for use with this dataset.
